description: UNDP’s 2010-2011 support in mine action assists Ethiopian Mine Action Office (EMAO) to continue fulfilling its role as the national humanitarian demining operator in Ethiopia.

subproject.description:
The project will reduce mine risk  and make aviavlable land for productive use by clearing land mine and providing Mine Risk education for  men and women.   In doing so the project will collectively pursue the achievement of the following 3 overall objectives: 

1. Improvement of food security and socio-economic development in country; 
2. Enhancement of peace and stabilization process in Tigray, Afar, and Somali regions; and 
3. Fulfillment of the Mine Ban Treaty obligations.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Mine Action in Tigray, Afar an
